parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the value, but you must ensure that it is unique among different requests. The token can only contain ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return. Valid values: any non-zero positive integer.

Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **5** to **100**.

Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~26243~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SortKey
parameters.description: The sorting basis.

parameters.name: SortMethod
parameters.description: The sorting method.

parameters.name: Tag.1.key
parameters.description: The key of tag 1 that is added to the instances.

parameters.name: Tag.1.value
parameters.description: The value of tag 1 that is added to the instances.

parameters.name: Tag.2.key
parameters.description: The key of tag 2 that is added to the instances.

parameters.name: Tag.2.value
parameters.description: The value of tag 2 that is added to the instances.

parameters.name: Tag.3.key
parameters.description: The key of tag 3 that is added to the instances.

parameters.name: Tag.3.value
parameters.description: The value of tag 3 that is added to the instances.

parameters.name: Tag.4.key
parameters.description: The key of tag 4 that is added to the instances.

parameters.name: Tag.4.value
parameters.description: The value of tag 4 that is added to the instances.

parameters.name: Tag.5.key
parameters.description: The key of tag 5 that is added to the instances.

parameters.name: Tag.5.value
parameters.description: The value of tag 5 that is added to the instances.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags that are added to the instances. Each tag is a key-value pair that consists of two parts: TagKey and TagValue. Format: `{"key1":"value1"}`.

parameters.name: proxyId
parameters.description: The ID of the proxy mode.
